summary: Build an English marketing website for Bhojpur Classic (tourist and travel transport services) with a clean, professional blue-and-white design focused on trust, safety, reliability, and phone-based bookings.
architectural_notes: Single-page marketing site in English with sections: Hero, Services, Vehicle Showcase (3 images), Why Choose Us, Contact (phone booking).
Primary conversion action is direct phone booking via click-to-call: +91 878-9514659.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive, single-page English marketing website for “Bhojpur Classic” with sections: (1) Hero showcasing AC buses, (2) Services overview, (3) Vehicle showcase/gallery, (4) Why choose Bhojpur Classic, (5) Prominent Contact/Phone booking CTA.

Implement a “phone booking” CTA flow using click-to-call links (tel:) throughout the page (at minimum: hero CTA and contact section) using the phone number +91 878-9514659, and clearly communicate that pricing is flexible based on destination and tour duration.

Create a Services overview section describing: sightseeing tours, airport transfers, and custom itineraries, with concise, professional service descriptions suitable for international and domestic tourists.

Add a Vehicle showcase/gallery section that displays three high-quality bus images of Bhojpur Classic branded vehicles (with accessible alt text) and a brief caption emphasizing comfort and AC travel.
Create a “Why choose Bhojpur Classic” section highlighting: experienced drivers, comfortable AC buses, local expertise, and flexible pricing, with a trust/safety-forward presentation.

Apply a clean, professional blue-and-white visual design style that communicates trust, safety, reliability, and comfort; use consistent typography, spacing, and component styling across all sections.
Add basic on-page SEO for a marketing site: set page title/metadata for Bhojpur Classic and ensure headings are structured (single H1 in hero, H2s for sections).
Place the provided/generated bus images in the static assets directory and reference them directly from the frontend without routing images through the backend.
Publish the current Bhojpur Classic single-page marketing site live as a production deployment on the Internet Computer so it is accessible via a public URL.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create website structure and content sections: Hero, Services overview, Vehicle showcase, Why choose us, and Contact/phone booking CTA
Add prominent phone booking flow (click-to-call) using contact number +91 878-9514659 and highlight flexible destination/duration pricing
Implement vehicle showcase/gallery using 3 provided high-quality bus images of Bhojpur Classic branded buses
Apply 'Trustworthy Professional' visual design: clean blue-and-white layout emphasizing safety, reliability, and comfort
Publish the current Bhojpur Classic marketing site live (production deployment)
